isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 18 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14618 AND RTLO-16618 SERIES - REASSEMBLE - AUXILIARY REAR BEARING ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: AUXILIARY REAR BEARING ASSEMBLY
svcproc.para: Place the rear bearing cone over the bearing and into the rear bore. Align the .100 shim over the cone and install the rear bearing cover with 4 bolts. Tighten only until snug (right, Figure 237). Retaining straps may also be used at this time; they are required for horizontal installation. Complete assembly by installing remaining rear bearing cover (left).

figure.caption: Figure 237. Place Rear Bearing Cone Over Bearing
